ValidationRule.description: The Allocation end date cannot be earlier than the Allocation start date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( YEAR(EndDate__c)< YEAR(StartDate__c), AND( DAY(EndDate__c) < DAY(StartDate__c) , MONTH(EndDate__c)= MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDate__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ), AND( MONTH(EndDate__c)< MONTH(StartDate__c), YEAR(EndDate__c)= YEAR(StartDate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Allocation end date cannot be earlier than the Allocation start date.
